{{Quote|There are people who knew it from the books, people who knew it from the films, and there are those who had managed to get to 46 without knowing that much about it at all.|Rory Michael Kinnear in an interview with Vanity Fair}}

'''Rory Michael Kinnear''' is an English actor and playwright. He will portray [[Tom Bombadil]] in the second season of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' series by [[Amazon Studios]].

Kinnear had yet to read ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' before getting the part, but after sharing news of the offer with his partner, she excitedly exclaimed that Bombadil was her favourite character in the books.<ref name="VF">{{webcite|author=Anthony Breznican|articleurl=https://www.vanityfair.com/hollywood/story/tom-bombadil-the-rings-of-power-first-look|articlename=Tom Bombadil Finally Steps Forth in ''The Rings of Power'' - An Exclusive First Look|dated=29 May 2024|website=[https://www.vanityfair.com Vanity Fair]|accessed=29 May 2024}}</ref>
